text: This story is incredibly long but Iam going to do my best to cut it down and only include the most important bits. When I was 14 and in a very low place, I met a teacher at my school. She was around 30. I didnat think much of it at first, but eventually I kept talking to her more and more and seeing her around. I found out very recently that my mom has cheated on my dad 4 times in the past. Theyave gone to counseling each time, where she denies her cheating until finally she admits it but blames it on him anot meeting her needs.a I didnat want to hear this in the first place but you canat unring a bell.

I had a dream that seemed so real. Someone shot my boyfriend in the stomach and he threw up. After the man shot my kids father he came to me and stood over me for what seemed like a life time. My heart was racing so fast I mean I could literally see the guys face but I have never seen him before in areal lifea.A  I was sitting across the street from where my boyfriend was shot. I remember for some reason sitting on a blue bench, holding a box, that was filled with snacks. (I never hang around outside on corners) I begged him not to shoot me because I had two babies right up the road. He still shot me in my head it felt so real.. I seen the flash from the gun, I felt the hot bullet; go through left side of my head, (right behind my hair line) and i also felt the the bullet come out of the my right side of my neck/underneath the chin.A  I could also feel the warm sticky blood coming from my head and neck. He shot me again and then i woke up.

I care little about people other than immediate family and my partner. Iam very possessive of people and get angry (internally) if they show interest in/preference to others. This applies most to afriendsa; (they would call me a friend but I donat consider them that), my family, my partner, my students.

A  I donat take Social Isolation for 3 years as a serious problem. But everyone around me begs to differ.A By aeveryonea I meant my mother, as my father works overseas. But nonetheless, I found myself curiously fascinated by my lack of concern for my health, social and physical. Itas not because I donat care for any of those, but rather the prospect of doing so seem bothersome. Maybe anot caringa and anot botheringa are the same sentences in different context. And maybe it is. I just find the word anot caringa a bit strong, as I do care to some degree, just donat care aenougha which is one way you can put it.

A  Back in May, me and my girlfriend had a break up which ended quite badly. Iave been with her for 3 years and it was quite a surprise when she wanted to end it because we had been having altercations. Anyways, i went round a friends house who lives opposite her house and the night took a turn and we was drinking and getting high. As i was leaving very intoxicated (which is not an excuse) i think my emotions got the best of me and i keyed her car. I instantly regretted this at the time and i couldnat believe what i done. I still regret it to this day! I instantly wrote a letter of apology the next day and payed for any damage. Im not a nasty person, it was a complete moment of madness from me!

Not a major complication but just interested in some different perspectives. I am a physically healthy late-30 year old man. I do not drink alcohol or smoke, I do not do drugs, I donat gamble, and I try to avoid eating bad food too often. I exercise regularly and have a pretty good life (married, child, dog, run my own business). I also donat waste money on buying random stuff to make myself feel rewardeda;.

a Difficulty to socialize and make friends; isolation a Rigid routines (he gets distressed if he canat follow them) a Fear of change (he doesnat want to throw old/broken things away) a Hygiene issues (he rarely showers and shaves and he never uses deodorant) a Sensitivity to noises and light a Repetitive motor mannerisms (which he didnat have as a child) If he had autism, though, he would have some speech difficulties, wouldnat he? He actually uses sarcasm and understands it perfectly. Never shown any speech delay either. Besides, I think I read someone is born autistic, so he canat become autistic at the age of 18. Itas been an evolution, thatas why Iam not sure what is going on. Is he just a very immature teenager or does he have a condition? (From Spain)

A  I should start by saying that I have never posted a question online before. Iam usually pretty logical and level headed and can resolve issues on my own. Itas the school me and my sister graduated from as well. Over a decade ago. But itas what I know, what Iam familiar with.

My girlfriendas male best friend has been sleeping over at her house. See, he recently moved into my house, and since heas moved, heas spent more time at her house than anywhere else. Iam perfectly okay with them hanging out, Iam glad she has such a good friend. But at the end of the day, I really am not okay with him sleeping over at her house when Iam not there. (Question from Canada)

Iam part of a FB group that supports women born with a congenital disease that prevents conception. Iave noticed that a lot of women in the group, though their intentions are good, are very negative and discouraging. Everyone talks so much about trying to be strong but they seem to do nothing to actually feel good about themselves. They just wallow in self-pity like the world owes them. And there seems to be a lot of people who seem to think itas perfectly ok to blackball other women in their life because they fall pregnant.

My SO is bipolar with strong suicidal tendencies and extreme anxiety. I left for 4 days and in that time she left the walk in closet for food a twice. Its been like this for a half year minimum and getting worse.

overwhelmed, anxious, stressed, panic attacks some times, not in the mood of doing anything from time to time, i like loneliness, i want to punish myself most of the time but never completely hurt myself (just beat myself in some parts of my body), iad insult myself or evening say really bad things as if i wasnat alone in my head (iad feel like there is me and the other evil me telling me all of that), i never self harmed and cut myself but the suicidal thoughts are often here (for example if iam driving the second after iad think about crushing the car against the wall or to another car) the dark thoughts i have all the time are really haunting me,

Hello, Iam a 16 year old girl who has had these creepy day dreams and it keeps getting worse. It occurred when my older sister began living with us (stepmom and dad). We never got a long as kids because I was raised separately as a child. She lived with 4 other of my siblings and I lived with an aunt of mine with her child till I was 10.

So Iam in love with my brotheras wife. We were friends before they married so I guess you could say I was robbed of a wife and robbed of a life. I wish she was mine but Iam not the kind of person that is jealous of or wants to ruin my brotheras marriage. I donat know what to do. Iam in dire need of help and advice. (From the UK)

Almost constantly; while Iam driving I think about getting into a crash, while Iam sitting at home I think about being robbed or killing myself. Anything, really. I want these things to happen and sometimes I gain the motivation to do something about it myself but I never really have the means or the motivation (for lack of a better word) wears off. To me, it doesnat matter whether the fantasy ends with my dying or not, and whether it is preferred or not really varies. Recently I had a friend kill himself, and obviously it got to me; but this all started way before he hung himself. While I am devastated about his loss, I also feel an odd sense of guilt and envy because he actually did what Iave always wanted to/thought about doing.

Are there ways to avoid letting chronically angry and verbally abusive people affect your mood? I have a bad-tempered family member that I cannot avoid. Instead, she goes around yelling, swearing, slamming doors and will raise her voice to make sure I hear it if I am far away or in bed. I donat mind curse words in general, but find the intent and vehemence of her swearing offensive and it is degrading to have this constantly directed at me.

Iave been dealing with this issue for a little over 7 years. It started out as becoming easily agitated, to the point Iad break things, rip up clothing, and shut out anyone close to me. Little mannerisms like looking at myself in reflective surfaces constantly, rear view mirrors, my phone, turned off laptop screens, bathroom mirrors, windows, basically any reflective glass surface, etc.

Mostly auditory, the microwave running and dishes breaking, but I keep feeling like thereas bugs on me whenever Iam really paranoid. How do I cope with thus fear?

My brother is 14 now, Iam 21. When he was around 3 or 4, and I was about 10 (vague memory) he slept over in my room all the time. But one time, after I saw a movie where people kissed, I was curious. We often kissed on the lips but one night before bed I kissed him too long. I think I just plopped my open mouth on his lips, not knowing that it was really asexuala or aromantica but thinking I was apracticinga so I must have known it was weird. I have dealt with self-esteem issues regarding my appearance, personality, self-worth and have always struggled with comparing my familyas earnings and awealtha with other families I know. Keeping in mind that I attend one of the best schools in my country, that I have excellent living conditions and that everybody who lives in my house has everything they need, I should not have a reason to feel this waya but still, my friends and other family members all have a great amount of wealth that makes me feel self-conscious of my where I live, what I do, how I dress and the things I own. All of this has accumulated and affected with my self-esteem, which has always been pretty bad, but recently I have not been able to control it or to ignore it, making me feel worthless and ashamed.

I am 15 and I feel like I might have some signs of being a psychopath. I tell lies every day, either to get attention or to get out of trouble and I feel no guilt about it. I can turn my charm on and off to get what I want, and I can be very good at getting people to do what I want. I feel some empathy like I feel sorry for people, but I have very little time for other peopleas problems and emotions. I donat like hurting people and I donat do it, however, I feel very little guilt about hurting peopleas feelings. When people try to tell me their problems I get bored easily and even annoyed. I like having power over people and I also feel like I can act very childish at times. I know Iam not a full-blown psychopath, but I feel like I show some signs and I need to know what to do. (From Scotland)
